name: Omega Strike
description: Omega Strike is a metroidvania game with a vast, open ended world and multiple playable characters. Explore the world, learn new abilities, upgrade your weapons and defeat Doctor Omega and his mutant armies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
